pages.text: The $(thing)Shield$() is, of course, one of the most advantageous pieces of battle equipment. On the contrary, there seems to be a lack enchantments for it. $(thing)Retribution$() is here to fill that gap. A $(thing)treasure enchantment$() only obtained through exploration, it can be applied to $(item)Shields$() and bestows $(thing)2 seconds of strength$() onto the user $(thing)upon successfully blocking an incoming attack$().
